flavorText: "What can I say? I'm a generous guy." - Sett
name: Coin

descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: Amid ambitious anglers and self-interested schemers, Lise has the one quality Sett prizes above all: reliability. She is never off, never short, and has never given Sett cause to wonder. This has granted Lise his backing and a warning to any seeking to stir up trouble: Bet against the House, and lose.
name: Attentive Accountant

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand, or spend 5 mana to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand, or spend 5 mana to Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description:
When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Bout Security</style></link> in hand and grant other <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Bout Security</style></link> +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 5: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Bout Security in hand and grant other Bout Security +1|+1.
Empowered 5: Quick Attack.
flavorText: " “If they think you’re thick, go on and let ‘em. Let the bad apples think they’re safe to run their games--there ain’t a thing in life better than the look in their eyes when they realize they underestimated you.” - Sett
name: Bout Security

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3 and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: "First round is about saying hello, and the second gets them cozy. Problems come out by the third, and from the fourth on, the lips get real loose--you wouldn't believe the kind of things I hear!"
name: Smooth Mixologist

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: The next time you play a unit this round, summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Play: The next time you play a unit this round, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Bingwen the Bird was once a fighter, so called for his cranelike stance and agility. Since retiring, he has taken up the mantle of a trainer--using his keen eye and firm hand to separate the fine talent from the coarse.
name: Master Bingwen, the Sieve

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “Some are in it for the coin, others the blood, and some for the roar of the crowd. Me? Never could choose just one. I need it all, and I have everything here in spades.”
name: Pit Professional

description: The first time I would drop below 1 Health while attacking, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> instead.
descriptionRaw: The first time I would drop below 1 Health while attacking, give me Barrier instead.
flavorText: Basking in the roar of the crowd packed into his exclusive underground arena, Sett indulges in a rare moment of introspection. He remembers all he fought for, and what might yet come his way. He knows one thing for certain, though: It’s good to be the Boss.
name: Sett

description:
While I'm attacking, I can't take damage or die.
Each round, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Show Stopper</style></link> in hand once you've spent 12+ mana. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
While I'm attacking, I can't take damage or die.
Each round, create a Show Stopper in hand once you've spent 12+ mana.
flavorText: “Problem with bein’ the boss is, for most, ya get soft. Your own callouses start healing, and before long you’re what you swore you’d never be. So I'm grateful for all this chaos. Finally, someone’s bringing the beast outta me!”
name: Sett

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy. Deal 1 to all other enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an enemy. Deal 1 to all other enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "For one moment, just before I shatter your spine to splinters, I'm gonna make you immortal.” - Sett
name: Show Stopper

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett
name: Facebreaker

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sett</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
Create a Sett in your deck.
flavorText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett
name: Sett's Facebreaker

descriptionRaw: Draw 2 and create 2 Coins in hand.
flavorText: “They give us real money, and we give them a chance. Heh… and some really wonder how the House always wins.”
name: Place Your Bets

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all enemies instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavorText: "The mask's not comin' off, girl. And unless you wanna end up looking like this thing, don't ask again."
name: The Old Timer

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all enemies instead.
descriptionRaw: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavorText: “You need this lesson, make no mistake⁠--but you ain’t gonna like it.” - The Old Timer
name: More Than You Can Chew
